TEXT: CARDINAL . The applicant was born in DATE and lives in GPE .
CARDINAL . Criminal proceedings were brought against the applicant by the public prosecutor at ORG under LAW . The applicant was accused of membership of an illegal organisation .

CARDINAL . On DATE the principal public prosecutor at ORG submitted his written opinion to the latter . This opinion was not communicated to the applicant .
CARDINAL . On DATE ORG upheld the judgment of the first - instance court .
CARDINAL . In DATE the applicant was released from prison following the reduction of his sentence in accordance with the provisions of the new LAW .
CARDINAL . The relevant domestic law and practice in force at the material time are outlined in the PERSON v. GPE judgment ( [ ORG ] , no . CARDINAL , § DATE , ORG CARDINALV ) .
